CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , the solar cell device fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and PC71BM exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 7.02% ( V OC = 0.80 V , J SC = 13.1 mA cm^-2 , FF = 0.67 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Copolymer: This is the name of the material used in the blend with PC71BM.
2. PC71BM: This is the name of the other material used in the blend with the copolymer.

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Copolymer
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. Copolymer
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymer |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , the solar cell device fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and PC71BM exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 7.02% ( V OC = 0.80 V , J SC = 13.1 mA cm^-2 , FF = 0.67 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Solar cell device
2. Copolymer
3. PC71BM (Polarizing Contact 71BM)
4. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
5. Open-circuit voltage (V OC)
6. Short-circuit current density (J SC)
7. Fill factor (FF)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph:

1. Copolymer
2. PC71BM (Polarizing Contact 71BM)
3. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
4. Open-circuit voltage (V OC)
5. Short-circuit current density (J SC)

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Properties in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities related to Material Properties in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Copolymer |
| PC71BM (Polarizing Contact 71BM) |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| Open-circuit voltage (V OC) |
| Short-circuit current density (J SC) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , the solar cell device fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and PC71BM exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 7.02% ( V OC = 0.80 V , J SC = 13.1 mA cm^-2 , FF = 0.67 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities can be identified as follows:

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is the value of the ratio of the electrical power produced by the solar cell to the incident solar power, expressed as a percentage. In this case, the PCE is 7.02%.
2. Open-circuit voltage (V OC): This is the voltage at which the solar cell operates in an open circuit, with no load connected. In this case, V OC is 0.80 V.
3. Short-circuit current (J SC): This is the current that flows through the solar cell when it is connected in a short circuit, with no resistance. In this case, J SC is 13.1 mA cm^-2.
4. Fill factor (FF): This is a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell, calculated as the ratio of the actual power output to the maximum possible power output, assuming a perfect solar cell. In this case, FF is 0.67.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

PCE: 7.02%
V OC: 0.80 V
J SC: 13.1 mA cm^-2
FF: 0.67
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, I apologize for the confusion earlier. Here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is the value of the ratio of the electrical power produced by the solar cell to the incident solar power, expressed as a percentage. In this case, the PCE is 7.02%.

Therefore, the only relevant entity in the paragraph that refers to the value of material properties is:

PCE: 7.02%

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 7.02% |

These are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph.
